title: SMC_Seg (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_Seg : STRUCT
This structure is used internally by the
SMC_Interpolator
.
It represents a path segment of fixed length in which a certain
acceleration shape is used.

rows.Name: dVelStart
rows.Comment: The start velocity of the segment (non-negative)

rows.Name: dVelEnd
rows.Comment: The end velocity of the segment (non-negative)

rows.Name: dJerk
rows.Comment: The jerk (signed), only used for changing acceleration
